CustomField.description: Used as merge fields in email template
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( Account.IsPersonAccount, text(Account.Salutation)<>"" ), CASE(text(Account.Salutation), "男性", Account.LastName + "様" , "1", Account.LastName + "様" , "2", Account.LastName + "様" , "3", Account.LastName + "様" , "003", Account.LastName + "様" , "女性", Account.LastName + "様" ,
""), "こんにちは " + Account.FirstName + " " + Account.LastName )
CustomField.label: Salutation_Email_Ja_Rimowa
